footer.description: Cultivating the ability of Taiwanese youth to organize hackathons for youth and promoting hackathon culture in Taiwan.

contactInfo.address: No. 1, Songgao Road, Xinyi District, Taipei City

aboutSection.tagline: Inspiring Future Tech Talents with <highlight>Innovative Thinking</highlight>
aboutSection.introduction: HackIt is a community platform dedicated to empowering teenagers through programming education, inspiring them to become future tech innovators.
aboutSection.founderStoryParagraph1: Founded in 2020, HackIt was initiated by a group of senior software engineers and educators passionate about tech education. Amidst the challenges of remote teaching during the pandemic, we saw new opportunities in digital education and realized that traditional education systems struggled to meet the cultivation needs of modern tech talent.
aboutSection.founderStoryParagraph2: As frontline tech professionals, we deeply understand the importance of practical experience and innovative thinking for future workers. Therefore, we decided to create a comprehensive platform integrating online learning, physical workshops, and hackathon competitions, allowing teenagers to engage in real tech project development in an edutaining environment.
aboutSection.founderStoryParagraph3: Over the past three years, HackIt has served over 25,000 students, organized more than 50 online and offline events, and helped many students realize their innovative projects, some even receiving recognition in international competitions.
aboutSection.missionParagraph1: We are committed to inspiring young people's technical potential and creativity through practical and innovative programming education, cultivating them to become future digital innovators and problem solvers.
aboutSection.missionParagraph2: We believe every young person should have the opportunity to access programming skills, regardless of their background or prior experience. Through our platform, we hope to remove barriers to tech education and enable more people to participate in building the digital future.
aboutSection.visionParagraph1: We aspire to build a thriving tech learning ecosystem where innovative thinking is encouraged, technical skills are empowered, and community collaboration is valued.
aboutSection.visionParagraph2: We aim to become a leading brand in youth tech education in Taiwan, creating a positive impact on society through the talents we cultivate and helping Taiwan maintain its competitiveness in the global digital economy.
aboutSection.coreValueInnovativeDescription: Encourage breaking traditional frameworks, cultivate creativity in problem-solving, and enable learners to think from different perspectives.
aboutSection.coreValueCommunityDescription: Establish a mutual learning environment, emphasize the importance of teamwork, and achieve greater success through collective growth rather than individual effort.
aboutSection.coreValuePracticalDescription: Emphasize both theory and practice, apply learning through real projects, and build a demonstrable portfolio to accelerate career development.
aboutSection.coreValueLifelongLearningDescription: Cultivate a habit of continuous learning; in an era of rapid technological change, curiosity and a passion for learning are the greatest competitive advantages.
aboutSection.ctaText: Want to learn more about our story and team members?
aboutSection.missionVisionSubtitle: The core ideals and ambitious goals that drive us forward
aboutSection.teamSubheader: A group of passionate, talented educators and tech experts

ctaSection.description: Join our creative and vibrant tech community to explore, learn, create, and grow together! Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, there's a place for you here.
ctaSection.noCommitment: No commitment needed! Join our community today!

description.first: HackIt is a secret base for creative 13-18 year-olds who love making things. Here we code, build projects, make friends, and
description.highlighted: create amazing digital possibilities for our generation

coding.title: Build Cool Programming Projects
